title: Bank Of Japan Sticks To Ultra-loose Monetary Policy
summary: The Bank of Japan said Friday it would maintain its long-standing, ultra-loose monetary policy as it looks to boost economic growth. The central bank has gone against the grain as its global peers hike interest rates to tackle inflation, pushing down the value of the yen against the dollar.

title: Texas Sheriff Seizes Cash From Bitcoin ATM, Tells Operator To 'Go to Hell'
